extendedInfo.description: Donât just play a legend.  Create your own.With companion by your side and blade in your hand, control your hero and embark on an epic journey across magical continents of labyrinths, mystical forests and the fiery depths of Hell. Select one of three loyal allies with unique abilities to aid your quest, and combine skills and strategy to dominate the enemy with distinctive experiences and outcomes.Enter dungeons in underground cities and wage war against ferocious monsters. Fight dragons. Tame dragons. Ride them.Prove your might against these creatures, then control them as your own. Swoop onto the battlefield on the back of a fire-breathing beast. Harness the power of the elements as you call flame, wind, lightning and ice on your enemies. Slash them with your tail as a sword, and make them feel the power of your claws.Defeat enemies in the swipe of a single finger using intuitive controls for high-scoring combos, and craft your own weapons and divine armour with rare and beautiful equipment scattered throughout the gameworld.Are you prepared to become the hero you were destined to be? Write the script to your own legend. The Sword of Inferno is born.Features:â¢	Master your craft: Collect ancient instructions from defeated foes to construct weapons and magical equipment.â¢	Get straight into the action: perform complex combos with the Auto-Attack feature specifically designed for touch-screens.â¢	Ride and command mighty dragons to bring new terror to your enemies.â¢	Choose from four unique characters with physical and magical skills. Prepare your strategy before battle and equip your team for victory.â¢	Dozens of spells with multiple combinations.â¢	Watch your screen come alive with awesome graphical effects.â¢	Use your talents wisely: Level up and assign your talent points the way you see fit. Create the warrior the YOU want.

reviews.title: The adds
reviews.comment: How can I make them stop is there a version to buy so the adds go away. Great game but the adds need to go before I give a five star
reviews.author: Brandon Provencio

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: This game is pretty good and fun to play. Its a great time killer and I highly recommend getting this app.
reviews.author: Domonic Ramos

reviews.title: Upgrade
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I upgrade my characters weapons and armor? Please fix this problem. It takes the joy out of the game.
reviews.author: Daniel Bennett

reviews.title: Way to repetitive
reviews.comment: Gotta play the same stages over and over and over and over and over to pay for the items that cost way way way way way way way to much. Gonna quit it from annoying repetitive stages before i beat it. And the buddy you have with you, uses all their mana/potions on enemies that are already dead or not in a group
reviews.author: Zachary McIntyre

reviews.title: PLEASE FIX BUG IN ALLIED CASTLE LEV 1!!!
reviews.comment: Consistent graphics and very great sound effects, wish it had more of a story line like the game players turns into a two minute movie. I just find it annoying the game freezes for my Fusion during this one fight in the Greylands when I reach the allie castle. No arrow lets me finish level one.  I wished the characters interacted more when you tap the character they should talk and the fights sometimes switched angles instead of the side all the time. Please fix the bug!!!!! Lol...if that was true,  I\'d give it a full five. Make more levels too.
reviews.author: Luna Pagos

reviews.comment: One of the best action/RPGS for Android, a must if youre a fan of these types of games. Fast and addictive gameplay, plenty of upgradable content, and challenging.
reviews.author: Ian Wilson

reviews.title: Huh.
reviews.comment: Pop up ads every time I press a button or move ahead one screen. Trying to exit the game was a headache. Auto attacking meant I was bored as hell. How is this rated so high?
reviews.author: Brian Munday

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Very simple controls, and they make this game easy to grasp with the walk through\'s. Wish it would allow you to fight your own fight instead of auto, but still a great game!
reviews.author: misty lynn

reviews.title: I liked it so much but!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This is My one if favorite game but there is some bugs that make me to close it .I can\'t enchance May weapons that make me to die and tell some one how to get maximum diamonds
reviews.author: yogeshwer singh

reviews.title: Crushed
reviews.comment: In Desertex / Boundless Desert, clicked, game went bland n crushed. Fix!!?
reviews.author: Rinnaroth Sim

reviews.title: Update this
reviews.comment: Create more special effect when using the ability also i expect to have a wonderful effect to fera and ash .anyway love this game.
reviews.author: Rico Duque

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Really fun game. Not a glitch that I\'ve found. Really enjoy the game play.
reviews.author: alison anderson

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This game is awesome you should really install it.It might be boring at the beginning,but if you keep on playing it,it become more fun
reviews.author: Ramil Tandoc

reviews.title: This was a great game..
reviews.comment: Great game...keep up your good work team...
reviews.author: Wan Anas

reviews.title: An ad starts every five seconds
reviews.comment: And the game lags because the next 27 ads are loading
reviews.author: bigcow200 .

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I\'d love to be able to customize the characters but I can tell that that\'s not going to happen, but still it\'s a great game.
reviews.author: Junior Fernandez

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Works well on my droid razor. One thing could be argued about having more ways to earn diamonds or the cooldown time for energy. Other than that kudos on the great game. Decent plot and battles.
reviews.author: josh storm

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: Game is very slow and boring. All you do is move a character around and he auto attacks. That is absolutely no fun.
reviews.author: Derek Vergara

reviews.title: Fun for a while
reviews.comment: This game is fun. Good controls and fun combat. But it gets old. I wish there was an online co-op but that\'s asking a lot. Also I wish there was a paid version with no adds and no micro transactions.
reviews.author: Alec Miller

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Nice game. Deffinitley worth installing. Deserves ***** (5 stars)
reviews.author: Jamie Thomas
